Package com.sencha.gxt.widget.core.client.button

Various GXT buttons.

          Description

Interface Summary
ButtonGroup.ButtonGroupAppearance

Class Summary
ButtonBar A horizontal row of buttons.
ButtonGroup  
CellButtonBase<C>  
IconButton A simple css styled button with 3 states: normal, over, and disabled.
IconButton.IconConfig  
SplitButton A split button that provides a built-in dropdown arrow that can fire an event separately from the default click event of the button.
TextButton A text button.
ToggleButton A 2-state toggle button.
ToolButton A IconButton that supports a set of predefined styles, see IconButton.IconConfig.
Tools
